title: Why Pixel 3 is missing so many basic features?
content:
Pixel 3 can't miracast my pics to friends TV's. Their cheap Chinese phones have no problem. Pixel 3 can't use two sim cards at once. Their cheap Chinese phones can. Whats the point Google? 

I always was Google fan.  I had Nexus One, I use many of your services.

But for this expensive let down (money wasted) I am severely pissed off. 

Give me my money back!
